Uses of Class
chess.Board

    • Uses of Board in chess

      Methods in chess that return Board 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Board Board.Chess()
      Create a standard 8x8 chessboard, starting at (0, 0) and ending at (7, 7).
      static Board Board.Circle​(int radius)
      Creates a circular board, rasterizing our squares using the midpoint circle algorithm.
      static Board Board.Rectangle​(int width, int height)
      Creates a rectangular board with width rows and height columns, starting at (0, 0) and ending at (width - 1, height - 1).
      static Board Board.Smiley()
      :)
      static Board Board.Square​(int size)
      Returns a square board with size rows and columns, starting at (0, 0) and ending at (size - 1, size - 1).
      Constructors in chess with parameters of type Board 
      Constructor Description
      Board​(Board other)
      Creates a board from another board
      Tour​(Board board, Piece piece)
      Create a new tour object with a Board and chess piece to use.
